dct_title_s: De stoel des oorlogs in Italien
dct_description_sm: per Nicolaum Visser; Luggert van Anze schulp.
Relief shown pictorially, and by shading.
3 bar scales on map, given in "Milliaria magna Italica sive Anglica," "Milliaria Germanica Communia," "Milliaria Gallica."
Key in upper left: Significationum hujus tabulae explicatio.
Latin text in key and scale statement.
Appears in Visscher's Atlas minor sive geographica compendiosa, approximately 1700.
